text:
1. Make your #Scoby (1-4 weeks) 
To grow the bacteria or the ‘mother’;
7 cups boiled water
½ cup  white sugar
1 tbsp  loose leaf black tea (I use loose leaf) or 4 tea bags black tea
1 cup  unpasteurized & unflavored store bought kombucha
A large glass container or jar to keep
A cheese cloth & a rubberband

Boil water add in sugar and tea, let it infuse and cool down to room temperature. Poor the sweetened tea into the jars and kombucha (ratio should be 1/4 kombucha for 3/4 sweetened tea). Cover with cheese cloth and secure with a rubber band. Set somewhere dark, still, and room temperature, like a cupboard, for 1 to 4 weeks, until a Scoby has formed. Singapore is great weather to grow your Scoby !
